comments.author: Alex
comments.content: I blew up a powerbar meant for 110 by plugging it in a 220 outlet. I'd be careful if you care for your case, and mostly its power supply...

comments.author: randy
comments.content: Yeah, I tried it anyway :D. Plugged in the power supply first without connecting it to the hard disk case. Nothing blew up. Then I connected the harddisk and it works fine. Yay experiment. Boo crappy label on power supply.
